entry.title: Reflections and Resolutions - An Undergrad Tale

link.title: Reflections and Resolutions - An Undergrad Tale

entry.content:
This will be an experimental blog post, where I test out the idea of making an article where I write one section each day. I was inspired to try this approach because, otherwise, I doubted whether I would ever have the motivation to finish this ambitious article.

The purpose of this writing exercise is, as the title suggests, to look back at my time at UofT as an undergrad, and to draw a few key lessons that I should remember while I am at Waterloo as a grad student.

Entering the undergrad years (2020–21)

COVID

Quantum computing

Theory CS

My first research

Testing my limits (2022–23)

Overloading courses

Overloading research

Lessons learnt (2024)

Onward towards grad school!
entry.summary: Looking back at the time between my last high school lecture and starting grad school
